channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Sound Smart: 8 Observations from NFL Week 18
item.description: Examining the NFL postseason field, potential coaching changes, Super Bowl favorites and the MVP race in Sound Smart from Week 18.

item.title: Super Bowl 2026 Odds: Seahawks Enter Playoffs as Favorite, Rams Not Far Behind
item.description: With the playoff bracket set, here are the odds for each team to win the Super Bowl.

item.title: Caleb Williams Breaks Bears Single-Season Passing Record, But Wants 'To Be Better'
item.description: Caleb Williams set a new Bears record on Sunday. However, the quarterback was more focused on their loss to the Lions after their regular-season final...

item.title: 2026 NFL Draft Order: Raiders Secure No. 1 Pick, Jets Hold No. 2 Pick
item.description: Who is in line to get the No. 1 pick in the 2026 NFL Draft? Here's the latest projected draft order.

item.title: Giants Owner John Mara Gets Game Ball After Win vs. Cowboys Amid Cancer Battle
item.description: New York Giants owner John Mara got a season-ending gift from his team three months into his cancer treatment.

item.title: Steelers escape Ravens' late push, win AFC North title
item.description: In a rock fight that morphed into a fourth-quarter track meet, Pittsburgh edges Baltimore to advance.

item.title: NFL draft order for Round 1: The first 18 slots are set, and the Raiders will pick at No. 1

item.title: Offseason guide for eliminated NFL teams
item.description: What must each do to have a better season in 2026? We have outlooks, early buzz and predictions.

item.title: Jags resurface Sean Payton's 'small-market' comment to lead Week 18 trolls
item.description: The final week of the 2025 NFL regular season didn't stop teams from being petty.

item.title: Transfer rumors, news: Real Madrid join chase for Wharton
item.description: Real Madrid have joined the race for Crystal Palace midfielder Adam Wharton. Transfer Talk has the latest.
